english.segment1: Sixteen never came. He just wanted to be understood. His mother knew his name. But never found the time to love her son. Of all the things in the world
english.segment2: We just need someone. We are more than wandering lives, shadows in the dark. We all need someone to carry each other through it all. Everybody needs someone
english.segment3: She was twenty three. When she lost herself out to the streets. Red light nights just to survive. All she wanted was a friend to talk to late at night. Of all the things in the world
